description: The vice president visited “The Late Show” on Wednesday for the first time since the 2020 election.
title: Kamala Harris Stops By to Chat With Stephen Colbert
title_page: Kamala Harris Stops By to Chat With Stephen Colbert - The New York Times
maintext:
Welcome to Best of Late Night, a rundown of the previous night’s highlights that lets you sleep — and lets us get paid to watch comedy. Here are the 50 best movies on Netflix right now.
Executive Branch Exclusive
Vice President Kamala Harris visited with Stephen Colbert on “The Late Show” on Wednesday. It was her first live appearance on the program since the 2020 election.
Colbert asked Harris about recent comments made by Gov. Ron DeSantis of Florida, in which he referred to the war in Ukraine as a “territorial dispute.”
